mapper.select: select r.*, p.ID as P_ID, p.CODE as P_CODE, p.NAME as P_NAME, p.LABEL as P_LABEL, p.DESCRIPTION as P_DESCRIPTION, p.IS_DELETED as P_IS_DELETED from T_ROLE r left join R_ROLE_PERMISSION rp on r.ID = rp.ROLE_ID left join T_PERMISSION p on p.ID = rp.PERMISSION_ID where r.ID = #{id}

select r.*, p.ID as P_ID, p.CODE as P_CODE, p.NAME as P_NAME, p.LABEL as P_LABEL, p.DESCRIPTION as P_DESCRIPTION, p.IS_DELETED as P_IS_DELETED from T_ROLE r left join R_ROLE_PERMISSION rp on r.ID = rp.ROLE_ID left join T_PERMISSION p on p.ID = rp.PERMISSION_ID where r.NAME = #{name} and r.IS_DELETED = 0

select r.*, p.ID as P_ID, p.CODE as P_CODE, p.NAME as P_NAME, p.LABEL as P_LABEL, p.DESCRIPTION as P_DESCRIPTION, p.IS_DELETED as P_IS_DELETED from T_ROLE r left join R_ROLE_PERMISSION rp on r.ID = rp.ROLE_ID left join T_PERMISSION p on p.ID = rp.PERMISSION_ID where r.IS_DELETED = 0

select r.*, p.ID as P_ID, p.CODE as P_CODE, p.NAME as P_NAME, p.LABEL as P_LABEL, p.DESCRIPTION as P_DESCRIPTION, p.IS_DELETED as P_IS_DELETED from T_ROLE r left join R_ROLE_PERMISSION rp on r.ID = rp.ROLE_ID left join T_PERMISSION p on p.ID = rp.PERMISSION_ID inner join R_USER_ROLE u on r.ID = u.ROLE_ID where r.IS_DELETED = 0 and u.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into T_ROLE ( CODE, NAME, LABEL, DESCRIPTION, IS_DELETED, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY_USER_ID, UPDATE_AT, UPDATE_BY_USER_ID, DATA_SOURCE ) values ( #{code}, #{name}, #{label}, #{description}, #{isDeleted}, #{createAt}, #{createBy}, #{updateAt}, #{updateBy}, #{dataSource} )
mapper.update:
update T_ROLE
CODE = #{code},
NAME = #{name},
LABEL = #{label},
DESCRIPTION = #{description},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted},
CREATE_AT = #{createAt, jdbcType=DATE},
CREATE_BY_USER_ID = #{createBy},
UPDATE_AT = #{updateAt, jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATE_BY_USER_ID = #{updateBy},
DATA_SOURCE = #{dataSource}
where ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into R_ROLE_PERMISSION ( ROLE_ID, PERMISSION_ID, IS_DELETED, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY_USER_ID, UPDATE_AT, UPDATE_BY_USER_ID, DATA_SOURCE ) values ( #{roleId}, #{permissionId}, #{isDeleted, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createAt, jdbcType=DATE}, #{createBy}, #{updateAt, jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateBy}, #{dataSource} )

insert into R_ROLE_PERMISSION ( ROLE_ID, PERMISSION_ID, IS_DELETED, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY_USER_ID, UPDATE_AT, UPDATE_BY_USER_ID, DATA_SOURCE ) values
( #{item.roleId}, #{item.permissionId}, #{item.isDeleted, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createAt, jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.updateAt, jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.updateBy}, #{item.dataSource} )
